resources.string: Your device charging is on , please check if fully charged then plug-out adapter.
Your device charging is off , please check if battery running out then plug-in adapter.
Your device battery is low please charge it
Battery is running out if you will not connect to adapter to change battery device may switch off.
Your device battery is okay enjoy your work on device.
Your device is connected to wifi-network connection , please check your not using un-safe connection.
Your device is connected to mobile-network connection , hope your net speed is good.
Please enable internet if you wish to use
Your device is not connected to internet connection , you are unable to use any kind of network service , please enabled to internet to use it.
Use Google Location Services to improve location accuracy. This can estimate your phone\'s location more slowly and use more battery.
GPS connection option is disabled in your device to use location please enabled it.
Your device is not in idle mode , And screen is turned-on , as you are doing some operations.
Your device is in idle mode
Your device is in idle mode , And screen is turned-off , as you are not doing any operations.
Notification at set time popup , please check description.
Alarm set on given repeating time
Notification at set time popup after set repeating time.
